sense.name: the medium of information, data representation
sense.examples: These computer files were sent in binary format. He imported the file into Ascii format. The album is only available now in CD or DVD format, not cassette.

sense.name: a protocol for a process or event
sense.examples: Has the family decided on the format for the grandfather's funeral service? They are following a different format this year for presentations at the conference. The detective claimed his investigation of the case had adhered to standard format.

sense.name: the layout of a written document
sense.examples: The movie studio tossed out several screenplays that were not in the proper format. The newspaper has changed its format from four columns per page to five. The chief editor liked Mary's proposed format for the new magazine.
